message-conn-failed: The internet connection failed or you are missing necessary permissions.
message-login-failed: Login failed. Please check your password.
message-server-unreachable: Server unreachable: Check your internet connection and the server URL. Also check if your Opencast allows access via Studio.
sources-video-selection-prompt: Please share your display and/or camera
sources-video-selection-done: Display and/or camera is now shared. Select your audio source!
sources-video-none-available: Your browser/device does not support capturing display or camera video :-(
sources-audio-selection-prompt: Please share your audio source (or proceed without any audio)
sources-audio-selection-done: Audio is now shared. Enter the studio!
source-display-not-allowed-text: Try reselecting the source. If that does not work, either reload this page or manually allow us to access your display (usually via a button next to your browser's address bar).
source-user-not-allowed-text: Either reload this page or manually allow us to access your camera (usually via a button next to your browser's address bar). If that does not help, try closing other applications that might use that camera: with some operating systems, only a single application can have access to the camera.
source-audio-not-allowed-text: Either reload this page or manually allow us to access your microphone (usually via a button next to your browser's address bar).
source-display-and-user-usage: Share your display, an application or a browser tab and your camera as well. Useful in scenarios like: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.
source-display-usage: Share your display, an application or a browser tab only. Useful in scenarios like:  Ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
source-user-usage: Share your camera. Useful in scenarios like: Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit.
upload-settings-validation-error: Invalid settings. Please verify and retry!
warning-https: Most browsers do not allow video capture over an unencrypted connection (HTTP). Please switch to HTTPS.
warning-recorder-not-supported: Your browser does not support recording media streams.
warning-recorder-safari-hint: For Safari on iOS, you can enable the experimental feature 'MediaRecorder' in settings.
warning-missing-connection-settings: Connection to Opencast is not configured: uploading is disabled. Please configure the connection in <1>the settings</1> (you won't lose your recording).
